page.title: 05CUSTOMS:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: There are very few local{customs. However,on November 5th. a large bonfire is held on the {Village {Green.}The local children start building the bonfire as early as the end of September.On Bonfire Night Mums,Dads,Aunts,Uncles,etc. and children collect on the Village Green to watch the fire burn and to let off their fireworks.Usually on December 23rd. the village schoolchildren go around the village{carol singing}and collecting money for charity.At { {harvest time }the children help decorate the Church for Harvest Festival.After the service they distribute the harvest produce to the Senior Citizens of the village.
